## üìò Introduction

In this course, we will learn how to solve complex decision-making problems using mathematical optimization techniques. We will explore linear programming, transportation and assignment models, queuing systems, scheduling algorithms, and game theory to make better decisions in real-world scenarios.
:::

## üßÆ TD Participation

<script type="text/javascript">
const { useState } = React;
const { Users, CheckCircle, XCircle } = LucideReact;

// TD data: TD1 real data, TD2 empty
const tdData = {
  "TD1": [
    { no: 1, name: "CHHEANG PHANY", contribute: false, details: "" },
    { no: 2, name: "CHHOUK PHALTHUNIN", contribute: false, details: "" },
    { no: 3, name: "DUK PANGARITH", contribute: true, details: "Problem 2" },
    { no: 4, name: "HEM BELLYDAY", contribute: true, details: "Problem 8" },
    { no: 5, name: "HOEURN SREYKA", contribute: false, details: "" },
    { no: 6, name: "HOK LYHOUR", contribute: false, details: "" },
    { no: 7, name: "HUN SOPHEAK", contribute: true, details: "Problem 5" },
    { no: 8, name: "KE MANUT", contribute: false, details: "" },
    { no: 9, name: "KHAY LINA", contribute: false, details: "" },
    { no: 10, name: "LENG DEVID", contribute: true, details: "Problem 3" },
    { no: 11, name: "LOT SOKLANG", contribute: true, details: "Problem 6" },
    { no: 12, name: "NGOUN LYHORNG", contribute: false, details: "" },
    { no: 13, name: "ORN VANDA", contribute: false, details: "" },
    { no: 14, name: "PHAL MENGHAK", contribute: true, details: "Problem 7" },
    { no: 15, name: "SOPHON RACHANA", contribute: true, details: "Problem 4" },
    { no: 16, name: "SOR RAKSMEY", contribute: false, details: "" },
    { no: 17, name: "SORNG SEYHA", contribute: false, details: "" },
    { no: 18, name: "SOU PICHCHOMRONG", contribute: false, details: "" },
    { no: 19, name: "SROEUN BUNNARITH", contribute: false, details: "" },
    { no: 20, name: "TAING KORNGMENG", contribute: false, details: "" }
  ],
  "TD2": [
    // Leave empty for now
  ],

  "TD3": [
    // Leave empty for now
  ], 

  "TD4": [
    // Leave empty for now
  ]
};

function TDParticipationDashboard() {
  const [activeTD, setActiveTD] = useState(Object.keys(tdData)[0]);
  const [selectedStudent, setSelectedStudent] = useState(null);

  const students = tdData[activeTD];

  const totalStudents = students.length;
  const participated = students.filter(s => s.contribute).length;
  const notParticipated = totalStudents - participated;
  const participationRate = participated > 0 ? ((participated / totalStudents) * 100).toFixed(1) : "0.0";

  const allStudentNames = Array.from(new Set(Object.values(tdData).flat().map(s=>s.name)));

  const getStudentParticipation = (name) => {
    return Object.keys(tdData).map(td => {
      const s = tdData[td].find(st => st.name === name);
      return {
        td,
        contribute: s ? s.contribute : false,
        details: s ? s.details : "-"
      };
    });
  };

  return React.createElement('div', { style:{ fontFamily:'sans-serif', maxWidth:'900px', margin:'0 auto' } },
    React.createElement('h2', { style:{ textAlign:'center' } }, 'Multi-TD Participation Dashboard'),

    // TD Tabs
    React.createElement('div', { style:{ display:'flex', gap:'10px', justifyContent:'center', marginBottom:'20px' } },
      Object.keys(tdData).map(td =>
        React.createElement('button', { key:td, onClick:()=>setActiveTD(td), style:{ padding:'6px 12px', cursor:'pointer', background: activeTD===td?'#1d4ed8':'#f3f4f6', color: activeTD===td?'white':'black', border:'none', borderRadius:'5px' } }, td)
      )
    ),

    // Stats
    React.createElement('div', { style:{ display:'flex', justifyContent:'center', gap:'20px', flexWrap:'wrap', marginBottom:'10px' } },
      ['Total Students','Participated','Not Participated','Participation Rate'].map((label,i) => {
        const value = [totalStudents, participated, notParticipated, participationRate+'%'][i];
        return React.createElement('div', { key:i, style:{ background:'#f3f4f6', padding:'10px', borderRadius:'8px', minWidth:'120px', textAlign:'center' } }, 
          React.createElement('p', { style:{ fontSize:'12px', color:'#6b7280' } }, label),
          React.createElement('p', { style:{ fontSize:'20px', fontWeight:'bold' } }, value)
        )
      })
    ),

    // Table
    React.createElement('table', { style:{ width:'100%', borderCollapse:'collapse', marginBottom:'20px' } },
      React.createElement('thead', { style:{ background:'#f9fafb', borderBottom:'2px solid #d1d5db' } }, 
        React.createElement('tr', null, ['No','Name','Status','Details'].map((h,i)=>React.createElement('th',{ key:i, style:{padding:'6px 10px', textAlign:'left', fontSize:'12px', color:'#6b7280'} }, h)))
      ),
      React.createElement('tbody', null, students.map(s => 
        React.createElement('tr', { key:s.no, style:{ borderBottom:'1px solid #e5e7eb', cursor:'pointer' }, onClick: ()=>setSelectedStudent(s.name) },
          React.createElement('td', { style:{ padding:'4px 8px' } }, s.no),
          React.createElement('td', { style:{ padding:'4px 8px', textDecoration:'underline', color:'#1d4ed8' } }, s.name),
          React.createElement('td', { style:{ padding:'4px 8px' } }, s.contribute ? '‚úÖ Participated' : '‚ùå None'),
          React.createElement('td', { style:{ padding:'4px 8px' } }, s.details || '-')
        )
      ))
    ),

    // Modal
    selectedStudent && React.createElement('div', {
      style:{
        position:'fixed', top:0, left:0, width:'100%', height:'100%', background:'rgba(0,0,0,0.5)', display:'flex', justifyContent:'center', alignItems:'center'
      },
      onClick: ()=>setSelectedStudent(null)
    },
      React.createElement('div', {
        style:{ background:'white', padding:'20px', borderRadius:'10px', minWidth:'300px', textAlign:'center', position:'relative' },
        onClick: e=>e.stopPropagation()
      },
        React.createElement('h3', null, selectedStudent),
        React.createElement('p', { style:{ fontWeight:'bold' } }, `Total TDs Participated: ${getStudentParticipation(selectedStudent).filter(s=>s.contribute).length} / ${Object.keys(tdData).length}`),
        React.createElement('table', { style:{ width:'100%', marginTop:'10px', borderCollapse:'collapse' } },
          React.createElement('thead', { style:{ background:'#f3f4f6', borderBottom:'1px solid #d1d5db' } },
            React.createElement('tr', null, ['TD','Status','Details'].map((h,i)=>React.createElement('th',{ key:i, style:{ padding:'4px', fontSize:'12px', color:'#6b7280' } }, h)))
          ),
          React.createElement('tbody', null, getStudentParticipation(selectedStudent).map((s,i)=>
            React.createElement('tr', { key:i, style:{ borderBottom:'1px solid #e5e7eb' } },
              React.createElement('td', { style:{ padding:'4px' } }, s.td),
              React.createElement('td', { style:{ padding:'4px' } }, s.contribute ? '‚úÖ Participated' : '‚ùå None'),
              React.createElement('td', { style:{ padding:'4px' } }, s.details)
            )
          ))
        )
      )
    )
  );
}

const root = ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById('td-dashboard'));
root.render(React.createElement(TDParticipationDashboard));
</script>
